system.descriptionText: As a Reaction, the vehicle's commander or driver can activate Frag Defenders. Anyone within 5 metres of the Vehicle's Outer Hull suffer 2d10 Explosive Damage with Pen 0. (Characters inside unaffected). Single Use Item, must be replaced afterwards.
